description: This file defines a Flutter widget for editing and creating notes within a notes application. It includes UI components for inputting note titles and content, handling save and delete operations, and managing state accordingly.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides a screen for creating a new note or editing an existing one, handling user input, save, and delete actions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the controllers and sets up listeners.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Loads existing note data if editing, and ensures initialization runs only once.

methods.name: _recomputeSaveEnabled
methods.description: Checks whether the save button should be enabled based on input content.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving a new or existing note via the notes provider.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Prompts for confirmation and deletes the note if confirmed.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers when widget is removed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the note editor, including app bar, input fields, and actions.
